title: An Animated Atlas of the World (Captioned)
creator_credit: Mike West and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
brief_description: Strongman, Atlas, is the humorous animated host of this tour around the globe. Sounding like the recent movie hero “Rocky”, Atlas provides accurate information on weather, wind, tides, storms and general geography for each country he visits. The film combines animation and some short live-action segments.
creator_credit_for_label: Mike West and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
